DOC.brief_summary: We want investigate whether food supplement resveratrol able counteract detrimental effect obesity .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate potential metabolic effect resveratrol healthy obese men . We hypothesize resveratrol counteract detrimental effect obesity , imitator calorie restriction give new insight basic biochemical pathway underpin human metabolism . Of special interest potential connection resveratrol , calorie restriction , SIRT1 , STAT5b GH/IGF-I axis .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 kg/m2 Otherwise healthy Written inform consent Any disease Alcohol dependency Allergy trial medication Present previous malignancy Participation clinical trial within three month randomization
